TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted but they want a hug so they send you in anyway

i wish i had a wish

Granted, but I can now only grant turnip-related wishes.

I wish for a glass of water. I'm thirsty.

Granted, but you notice that someone dropped poison in your glass exactly 7 minutes and 33 seconds after you drink it.

I wish for a better computer

granted but it is so good everyone gets jealous and kills you for it

i wish that i couldn't die

Granted, but you watch all of your family go, all of your friends go, and then you go insane because of this not being able to comprehend that you can live forever, so you gain memory loss also.

I wish for a stapler that worked at school today.

Granted but it hugs your face when you finish stapling your papers and puts a staple into your nose.

I wish I was a marsian

Granted, you are reincarnated as one once you die having no recollection of wishing to be a martian.

I wish for a boomerang with totemic KSP depictions on it.

granted but when it flies it flies and kills you and all of your best friends

i wish for my own personnal battle tank

Granted, enjoy your new Hot WheelsÃ¢â€žÂ¢ battle tank toy.

I wish I could talk to dead people...

Granted, enjoy your new Hot WheelsÃ¢â€žÂ¢ battle tank toy.

I wish I could talk to dead people...

Granted, but they do not talk back.

I wish I had cancer.

Granted but you will die in 2 days.

I wish to have any amount of wishes.

1. I wish for my wishes not to be corrupted.

2. I wish to be Derpy Hooves.

3. I wish KSP Was real life.

granted but they are so good that they are corrupted for other people already so everyone else suffers because they cant be corrupted

i wish that Sbowyer didn't wish for non-corrupted wishes

Granted, you can edit Sbowyer28's post to change the wish.

I wish for a shrubbery!!!!!!!!!! As a side not I also wish for you to bring a shrubbery to Jeb, it would be well appreciated!!!!!!!!!!!!

granted but it is so ugly that you vomit everytime you see it

i wish that obamma lost the election

Please do not introduce politics onto the KSP forums, I am obviously not a mod, but this is not a political game. Politics should not be included on this type of thread. I think that you understand why.

I wish for a 38 hour day on Earth.

Granted but the earth will be struck by an asteroid.

I wish there was no gravity on earth.

Granted, then we would all fly off the surface and die, so you basically wished yourself to a creative death.

I wish for a picture of the custom planet found here. http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/22395-%28WIP%29-Pluto-Analog-further-out-than-Jool?highlight=Hofugir and here http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/22707-WIP-Pluto-Analog-Further-out-than-Jool?highlight=Hofugir I want it so bad.

Granted, but you will be the only person who does not get to have it when it comes out.

(That's awesome though, I hope he finishes it)

I wish I was supreme ruler of the world.

Granted, you are supreme ruler of some world in a galaxy far far away.

I wish that my boomerang would dry faster.

(School project illustrating Aboriginal stuff)

Granted, it dries to fast, gets brittle and breaks.

I wish for my ships not to disappear on Eve.

Granted, but now when you eva on it, your kerbals disappear!

I wish that I had a better PC. That dosent eat ksp or me.

Granted, it eats your pets instead.

I wish for the MMI satellite pack to not be discontinued.
Granted, it becomes so big it enters the real world and you're sent up into space in an MMI satellite which burns up on re-entry, with you in it.

Granted, but you didn't make a wish, so you just wasted one.

I wish I had a Beagle

Granted, but the beagle tears out your internal organs and kills you.

I wish I had Halo 4.
